The clock is ticking, and companies need to put in place technical measures to comply.”]Article 17 signals what the market already knows:
License and monetize.[/vc_custom_heading][vc_empty_space empty_h=”3″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”4″ bottom_padding=”4″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”4″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″][vc_column column_width_percent=”86″ align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”4″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/1″][vc_custom_heading text_font=”font-555555″ text_size=”h4″ text_color=”color-306633″]Article 17 is designed to encourage the growth of a digital media marketplace where copyrighted content is appropriately protected, licensed, and monetized to the benefit of rights holders, social networks, and those enjoying the content online.[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”4″ bottom_padding=”4″ back_color=”color-144234″ overlay_alpha=”50″ equal_height=”yes” gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ row_name=”monetization”][vc_column column_width_percent=”90″ position_horizontal=”left” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text_size=”h4″]What do social networks need to do to prepare?[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text]With the volume of user generated content uploaded to established social networks, an automated content recognition service is key to complying with Article 17.

  • Put in place technical measures, such as an automated content recognition service, to ensure that unauthorized copyrighted media doesn’t get uploaded
  • Obtain licenses where possible or work with rights holders to protect their work
  • Implement a license management system where licenses are obtained
  • Build reporting capabilities around usage as required under Article 19

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_visibility=”yes” medium_width=”0″ mobile_visibility=”yes” mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text_size=”h4″]Find the right business partner to help you protect, license and monetize.[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text]Effectively identifying copyrighted content is only the first step toward monetization. Social networks should be looking for a business partner offering solutions to create revenue streams.

Look for vendors that can:

  • Implement at scale
  • Ensure the authorized use of content
  • Provide content licensing support by identifying content accurately

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”4″ bottom_padding=”4″ back_color=”color-xsdn” overlay_alpha=”50″ equal_height=”yes” gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ row_name=”monetization”][vc_column column_width_percent=”90″ position_horizontal=”left” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text_size=”h4″]What about smaller social networks?[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text]

The EU wants to give small or emerging platforms a chance to grow before implementing more technical measures, but they also must comply with Article 17.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_visibility=”yes” medium_width=”0″ mobile_visibility=”yes” mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text_size=”h4″]Small social network, but reaching toward monetization?[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text]Look for a service provider who can:

  • Provide a pricing and technical on ramp
  • Support a wide variety of easily scalable services (content identification, licensing support, royalty tracking, etc.) to meet your evolving needs

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”5″ bottom_padding=”5″ back_color=”color-199767″ back_image=”5124″ parallax=”yes” overlay_color=”color-199767″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/1″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h1″ text_font=”font-384419″ text_size=”h1″ text_color=”color-xsdn” sub_lead=”yes” subheading=”Audible Magic is ready to support both emerging and established social platforms with their Article 17 compliance needs.”]Audible Magic can help.[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”4″ bottom_padding=”4″ back_color=”color-xsdn” overlay_alpha=”50″ equal_height=”yes” gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ row_name=”monetization”][vc_column column_width_percent=”90″ position_vertical=”middle” align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/1″][vc_custom_heading text_size=”h4″]Work with the best.[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text]Audible Magic is the established leader in ACR with a proven scalable infrastructure.[/vc_column_text][vc_button button_color=”color-445744″ radius=”btn-circle” outline=”yes” border_width=”0″ link=”url:%2Ftechnology%2F|||”]Learn more[/vc_button][vc_column_text]We work with the industry leaders – labels, publishers, TV and film studios.
We bring extensive experience in supporting top social networks.[/vc_column_text][vc_button button_color=”color-445744″ radius=”btn-circle” outline=”yes” border_width=”0″ link=”url:%2Fcontact%2F|||”]Set up a consultation to prepare for Article 17[/vc_button][vc_column_text]Learn more about Article 17 on our blog.[/vc_column_text][vc_button button_color=”color-445744″ radius=”btn-circle” outline=”yes” border_width=”0″ link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.audiblemagic.com%2Fnewsroom%2Fblog%2F|title:Blog||”]Read more[/vc_button][/vc_column][/vc_row]
